name: keycloak-config
description: Keycloak configuration project with BMAD-METHOD and claude-task-master integration

scripts.keycloak:start: docker run --name keycloak -p 8099:8080 -e KEYCLOAK_ADMIN=admin -e KEYCLOAK_ADMIN_PASSWORD=admin quay.io/keycloak/keycloak:26.3.2 start-dev
scripts.keycloak:export: docker exec -it keycloak /opt/keycloak/bin/kc.sh export --dir /opt/keycloak/data/import --realm myrealm --users skip

author: Your Name
